title: Super Bowl LI nets third-highest TV rating

text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Super Bowl LI nets third-highest TV rating The New England Patriots historic comeback victory over the Atlanta Falcons delivered Fox the third-highest Super Bowl broadcast ratings among metered markets, according to Nielsen Media Research. Post to Facebook Super Bowl LI nets third-highest TV rating The New England Patriots historic comeback victory over the Atlanta Falcons delivered Fox the third-highest Super Bowl broadcast ratings among metered markets, according to Nielsen Media Research. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2kdND2q Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Super Bowl LI nets third-highest TV rating A.J. Perez , USA TODAY Sports Published 10:41 a.m. ET Feb. 6, 2017 | Updated 16 minutes ago CLOSE x Share Here's a look at some of the best moments on Twitter during Super Bowl LI. USA TODAY Sports New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady (12) and wide receiver Julian Edelman (11) celebrate their Super Bowl win. (Photo: Bob Donnan, USA TODAY Sports) 
The New England Patriots' historic comeback victory over the Atlanta Falcons — with perhaps an assist from Lady Gaga at halftime — delivered Fox the third-highest Super Bowl broadcast ratings among metered markets, according to Nielsen Media Research. 
The game had a 48.8 rating and a 72 share, the largest overnight rating in Fox’s history. Fox’s ratings for the game were 3% better than when the network last broadcast the game, Super Bowl XLVIII (Seattle Seahawks and Denver Broncos) in 2014. 
SUPER BOWL COVERAGE 
The ratings peaked at a 52.1/74 share between 10-10:30 p.m. ET as the game went into overtime for the first time in Super Bowl history. Tom Brady and the Patriots secured a 34-28 victory on the first drive. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Confetti fills the air following the New England Patriots 34-28 overtime victory over the Atlanta Falcons during Super Bowl LI at NRG Stadium.
